meta.title: PerfReviews | Web Performance Consulting
meta.description: Improve your website's performance with our audit and optimization services. Experts in usability and performance with experience in leading companies.

HomePage.title: We Improve Your Web Performance
HomePage.description: Gain more revenue and make your users happier with our web audit and optimization services

audits.title: Audit
audits.description:
The performance of your website is very important. A website that loads quickly on any device and network conditions improves key business metrics. We will work with you and your team to identify the main issues affecting your website's performance.



Once the study is complete, we will provide a detailed document with tips to help the development team improve both the performance and user experience of your website.

subscriptions.title: Continuous Support
subscriptions.description: Ensure your website is always optimized. Receive continuous support and regular updates to ensure your site operates at its best capacity. We monitor and improve your website to offer the best experience to your users and maximize your results.

item-1.title: What is a web performance audit?
item-1.description: A web performance audit is a comprehensive analysis of your website to identify issues that affect its speed, usability, and overall performance.

item-2.title: How long does the audit take?
item-2.description: The complete audit process usually takes between 10 and 15 business days, depending on the size and complexity of your website.

item-3.title: What will I receive at the end of the audit?
item-3.description: You will receive a detailed report with key findings, specific recommendations, and an action plan to improve your website's performance.

item-4.title: How is the audit conducted?
item-4.description: We use advanced tools and proven methods to evaluate all aspects of your website, including load speed, image optimization, code, site structure, and more.

item-5.title: How does continuous support work?
item-5.description: We become part of your team. We constantly monitor your website and provide specific advice to improve it. Depending on the plan, we also conduct pair programming and workshops.

item-6.title: Can I cancel my subscription at any time?
item-6.description: Yes, you can cancel your subscription at any time by contacting us.

item-7.title: Which metrics do we focus on?
item-7.description: We focus on improving your website's Core Web Vitals.

item-8.title: What are Core Web Vitals?
item-8.description: Core Web Vitals are a set of metrics defined by Google that measure the real user experience.

item-9.title: Which communication channel do we use?
item-9.description: We create a channel on Discord where your entire team can ask for help or resolve doubts whenever they want.

item-10.title: Do you offer performance improvement guarantees?
item-10.description: While we cannot guarantee specific improvements due to the variability in each website's conditions, our track record shows that all our clients experience significant improvements in their Core Web Vitals.

how.title: How do we work?
how.description: Our process focuses on systematically and effectively improving your website's performance. Here we explain each step:

step-1.title: We Analyze Your Web
step-1.description: We examine your website to identify performance issues and prioritize them based on their impact, focusing on Core Web Vitals.

step-2.title: We Measure and Optimize
step-2.description: We help you measure your application's performance with real-world and lab data and provide solutions for the issues found.

step-3.title: We Share Knowledge
step-3.description: We enhance your team's web performance skills through result analysis, articles, and educational videos.

meta.title: Blog
meta.description: We teach web performance by analyzing real websites. We share tips, tools, and workflows to improve website performance.

BlogPage.title: Blog
BlogPage.description: In our blog, we write about the latest in the world of web performance optimization.

meta.title: Our Web Performance Reviews
meta.description: We teach web performance by analyzing real websites. We share tips, tools, and workflows to improve website performance.

ReviewsPage.title: Web Performance Reviews of Real Sites
ReviewsPage.description:
At PerfReviews, we analyze the performance of websites. It's an ideal way to teach how to use tools to detect, fix, and prevent performance issues.



We are recognized Google Developer Experts in web technologies and have extensive experience developing websites with a special focus on usability, accessibility, and performance.



Since websites are dynamic projects, the reviews may mention aspects that are no longer reproducible. Therefore, we accompany the videos with a series of reports that allow you to visualize a 'snapshot' of the website at the time of the study.
